title: Mobile Device Management (Intune)
description: Assistance with Company Portal, work email on phone, and device compliance.

steps.title: Check Compliance Status
steps.instruction: Open the 'Company Portal' app on your device and check if your device is marked as 'Compliant'. Follow any prompts to fix issues.

steps.title: Update OS
steps.instruction: Ensure your phone's operating system (iOS or Android) is up to date. Outdated OS versions are often blocked.

steps.title: Sync Device
steps.instruction: In Company Portal, select your device, tap the menu (three dots), and select 'Check Status' or 'Sync'.

steps.title: Reinstall Profile
steps.instruction: If email stops working, try removing the work profile/account and re-enrolling via Company Portal.

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If you cannot access work apps, raise a ticket with: Device Model, OS Version, and screenshot of the error in Company Portal.
